T02D1261:286a-1: shr'i he ru ka bh'u ta n'a ma mandala no pi k'a /

T02D1261:302a-64: de nas langs te rnga la sogs pa'i sgras de
T02D1261:302b-0: la mngon du phyogs shing rim pa ji @302b lta
T02D1261:302b-1: ba bzhin du khur pa'i khu ba la sogs pa
T02D1261:302b-2: thal mos lan gsum gyi bar du gtong zhing bdud
T02D1261:302b-3: rtsi'i mchog tu gyur pa'i gtor ma des de dag
T02D1261:302b-4: tshim par bya'o // de ltar na phyogs skyong la sogs pa la gtor ma phul bas /
T02D1261:302b-5: de rnams kyis nye bar spyad de dga' ba dang
T02D1261:302b-6: ldan pas sgrub pa po la mngon par mos pa'i
T02D1261:302b-7: dngos grub ster zhing phyogs par bsgoms la /
T02D1261:302b-8: yang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa phul te mchod pa
T02D1261:302b-9: rnam pa lngas mchod la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
T02D1261:302b-10: kyis bstod cing / thod pa na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi myangs la bzod par gsol te /
T02D1261:302b-11: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1261:302b-12: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1261:302b-13: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1261:302b-14: slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1261:302b-15: aom a'a: h'u% badzra mu: zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1261:302b-16: gshegs nas kyang de rnams rab tu dga' ba'i yid
T02D1261:302b-17: dang ldan pas rang rang gi gnas su shes par
T02D1261:302b-19: de nas slob dpon rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin
T02D1261:302b-20: pa'i sngags pas rdo rje dang dril bu lag tu
T02D1261:302b-21: bzung ste / g-yas brkyang ba'i go 'phang gis gnas la /
T02D1261:302b-22: kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas me tog sngon po'i phreng ba blangs la /
T02D1261:302b-23: h'u% h'u% gi sgra brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D1261:302b-24: hi hi'i rnam par 'jigs pa'i ngang tshul dang rdo
T02D1261:302b-25: rje'i go 'phang dang rdo rje'i gar gyi shugs kyis
T02D1261:302b-26: dkyil 'khor du zhugs la dril bu dkrol zhing bskor
T02D1261:302b-28: dman pa dang stong pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor la bltas la /
T02D1261:302b-29: me tog gi phreng ba sngon po bcom ldan 'das la phul te /
T02D1261:302b-30: slar gar gyi sbyor bas blangs la /
T02D1261:302b-31: rang gi spyi bor bcings te /
T02D1261:302b-32: dkyil 'khor la mchod pa chen pos mchod par bya'o //
T02D1261:302b-33: ko sha tas kar kartsu re //
T02D1261:302b-34: mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi //
T02D1261:302b-35: dkyil 'khor mdun du spos rnams ni //
T02D1261:302b-36: rtag par dgyes mdzad dgod par bya //
T02D1261:302b-37: srog dang kun dur gla ba dang //
T02D1261:302b-38: rgya mo las ni 'byung ba rnams //
T02D1261:302b-39: rin chen rgyal po dgyes pa'i spos //
T02D1261:302b-40: bu ram gyis sbyar lho yi char //
T02D1261:302b-41: pa pa ti skra pra ba ga / sa de dri dang sa tir byas //
T02D1261:303a-2: kha shar gyis sbyar rgyab tu bzhug / tsandan gnyis dang ga bur dang /
T02D1261:303a-3: gla ba sen mo sa la ki /
T02D1261:303a-4: don yod grub pa dgyes pa'i spos //
T02D1261:303a-5: mar gyis sbyar la g-yon du bzhag / dpal du ma mi bskyod kha che dang //
T02D1261:303a-6: pha li ni dang rgya mtsho skyes //
T02D1261:303a-7: dpal ldan khrag 'thung dgyes pa'i spos //
T02D1261:303a-8: kha ra yis sbyar rang mdun dgod //
T02D1261:303a-9: bo la gla ba sa rdzi dbang //
T02D1261:303a-10: ko si aa sreg 'dab mnyam pa //
T02D1261:303a-11: til mar gyi bsgos mar me ni //
T02D1261:303a-12: 'od ldan mtshams su dgod par bya //
T02D1261:303a-13: gal te 'du ba tshogs pa yod na dkyil 'khor
T02D1261:303a-14: las mi ring bar bsnyen bkur dang gus pa sngon
T02D1261:303a-15: du song bas shar phyogs kyi char ni bcom ldan
T02D1261:303a-16: 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D1261:303a-17: gdon par bya'o // lhor ni rin po che'i tog go //
T02D1261:303a-18: nub tu ni sdong po brgyan pa'i mdo sde'o //
T02D1261:303a-19: byang du zla ba'i sgron ma'i mdo sde'o //
T02D1261:303a-20: gar la sogs pa dang pheg rdob pa yang phyogs bzhir bya'o //
T02D1261:303a-21: de nas yang me tog bzang po sna tshogs pa la aom badzra pushpe a'a: h'u% sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:303a-22: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1261:303a-23: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'u% sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:303a-24: zhes bya ba 'dis lhan cig skyes pa yang dag par sbyar ba'i spos so //
T02D1261:303a-25: aom badzra d'i pe a'a: h'u% sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:303a-26: zhes bya ba 'dis bskol ba'i til mar me'i rtse mo'i snang ba'o //
T02D1261:303a-27: aom dhva% dhva% badzra ne bi dye a'a: h'u% sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:303a-28: zhes bya ba 'dis sa li dri zhim po'i lha bshos so //
T02D1261:303a-29: gzhan yang mchod pa'i rdzas ni h'u% yig las bskyed
T02D1261:303a-30: pa byas la yi ge gsum gyis phul la bstod
T02D1261:303a-31: pa dang bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
T02D1261:303a-32: de nas cho ga dman pa dang stong pa yongs
T02D1261:303a-33: su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor la sngar
T02D1261:303a-34: phyag 'tshal ba'am / yang na mos pas las thams
T02D1261:303a-35: cad pa'i thab khung du rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya
T02D1261:303a-36: phyag 'tshal ba'am / ste / dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs sam /
T02D1261:303a-37: shar phyogs kyi char sa ser po la zheng du
T02D1261:303a-38: khru gang gi tshad tsam brkos la zhabs su ni
T02D1261:303a-40: rdo rje phreng bas bskor zhing dbus su ni bidhi
T02D1261:303a-41: ka'i mtshan ma gnas shing ring thung sor brgyad pa
T02D1261:303a-42: gtso bo'i mtshan ma byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbus su
T02D1261:303b-0: ste / steng du sor bzhi pa'i @303b bar mtshams
T02D1261:303b-1: bor la zheng dang dpangs su ni sor bzhi pa
T02D1261:303b-2: padma rgyas pa'i rnam pa lta bu la phyogs rnams
T02D1261:303b-3: su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan cing mtshams
T02D1261:303b-4: su ni rdo rje rtse gsum pas bskor zhing khru
T02D1261:303b-5: gang tsam gyi thab khung gis dang ldan pa'i thab
T02D1261:303b-6: khung byas las ser pos byug cing /
T02D1261:303b-7: dkyil 'khor gyis yang lci bas nye bar byugs la /
T02D1261:303b-8: yang de gnyi ga dri ser po dang bdud rtsi lnga bsres pas nye bar byug pa byas la /
T02D1261:303b-9: me tog bzang po khra bo'am /
T02D1261:303b-10: me tog ser pos dus gsum du dgram par bya'o //
T02D1261:303b-11: de nas thab khung shis pa de la nang la ni lo ma'am /
T02D1261:303b-12: sha la'i bar ni'am chu shing gi lo ma'am gos phra mos kun nas gdab par bya'o //
T02D1261:303b-14: rdul tshon gyis thab khung bri bar bya'o //
T02D1261:303b-15: de nas khrus dang dri zhim pos yan lag dang gos khra bos brgyan pa dang /
T02D1261:303b-16: me tog gi phreng ba dang thor tshugs dang yid
T02D1261:303b-17: rab tu dga' bas bstan bzang po la 'dug pa'am
T02D1261:303b-18: / rgyal po'i rol pas bsrung ba'i bzlas pa byas
T02D1261:303b-19: la kha byang du phyogs pa'am kha shar du phyogs
T02D1261:303b-20: pas ji srid mngon par 'dod pa rgyas par gyur
T02D1261:303b-21: pa de srid du sngags pas dga' ba dang ldan
T02D1261:303b-22: pas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1261:303b-23: de nas mdun du bdud rtsi lnga dang chur bsres pas mandala byas la /
T02D1261:303b-24: me tog gi gcal yang bkram ste /
T02D1261:303b-25: g-yon gyi char yang manydzi la sogs pa gser ram
T02D1261:303b-26: dngul lam zangs sam rdo shing ngam sa'i rang bzhin
T02D1261:303b-27: nam dung ngam nya phyis sam ba rna pu ta
T02D1261:303b-28: la sogs pa legs par bkrus la bdugs te snod
T02D1261:303b-29: gsum bzhag la / de dag tu zho dang til
T02D1261:303b-30: dang bi ta'i dris ji ltar brjod pa bzhin du
T02D1261:303b-31: 'jug ngogs kyi chus dgang bar bya'o //
T02D1261:303b-32: de nas dang po'i snod kyi chu la aom gyi
T02D1261:303b-33: mtha' can las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis lan bdun
T02D1261:303b-35: snod gnyis pa'i chu la ni yi ge gsum gyi
T02D1261:303b-36: bar du tshud pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags aom gyi
T02D1261:303b-37: mtha' can gyis lan bdun gyi bar du bsngags par
T02D1261:303b-38: bya'o // de nas mdun du ma nydzi gnyis la
T02D1261:303b-39: bzed zhal gnyis kyi snod bzhag la snga ma bzhin
T02D1261:303b-41: g-yas kyi phyogs su bud shing la mngar gsum dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1261:304a-1: pa la zho mar dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa til
T02D1261:304a-2: nag po dang so ba dang mar du ldan pa
T02D1261:304a-3: / sa ha'i me tog dang bil ba'i 'bras bu
T02D1261:304a-4: dang s'a lu dang 'bras thug po che dang so
T02D1261:304a-5: / ba dang / nas dang 'gro dang rgyal po sran ma dang /
T02D1261:304a-6: sran ma ma sha dang padma dang n'a ga ge sar dang kar ni ka dang /
T02D1261:304a-7: me tog dmar po la sogs pa'i bsreg rdzas la
T02D1261:304a-8: las thams cad pa'i chus btab la dgod par bya'o
T02D1261:304a-9: // de nas bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1261:304a-10: gtor ma byin la lha'i rnal 'byor du byas pa'i
T02D1261:304a-11: rnal 'byor pas mchod sbyin gyi shing las byung ba'i
T02D1261:304a-12: thab khung nas 'bus ma zos pa'i bud shing blangs
T02D1261:304a-13: la / dge 'dun gyi tshang bang ngam /
T02D1261:304a-14: nor bu las byung ba'am rgyal po'i tshang bang nas me chen po'i me blangs la /
T02D1261:304a-15: snod gtsang mar bzhag la 'o ma dang ldan pa'i bud shing skam pos sbar la /
T02D1261:304a-16: de nas de'i yi ger gsum gyis bus la las
T02D1261:304a-17: thams cad pa'i chu la ku sha'i bsang sbrel gyi
T02D1261:304a-18: rtse mo nas bzung la lan gsum gyi bar du
T02D1261:304a-20: thab khung gi dbus su shing skam po'i tshal bu'am rtsva skam po dang bcas pas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1261:304a-21: de nas aom dzva la dzva la h'um zhes bya
T02D1261:304a-22: ba'i sngags bzlas la rlung g-yab kyis sbar bar bya
T02D1261:304a-23: zhing / rigs kyi snying pos lan bdun gyi bar
T02D1261:304a-24: du bsngags pa'i mar gyis blugs la sbar bar bya'o
T02D1261:304a-25: zhing / // de nas aom ai me ku sh'a
T02D1261:304a-26: shu bh'a di bya ba pu tra brahma ba bi
T02D1261:304a-27: te na buddha dharma sam ha ra k'a: bri thi
T02D1261:304a-28: bi ra sam badzra ta garbha aa bighn'am ma ma
T02D1261:304a-29: sh'antim ku ru bandya [?] aom badzra satva a'a: 'dis
T02D1261:304a-30: lan bdun gyi bar du bsngags pa'i ku sha rtsa
T02D1261:304a-31: ba nas bton cing gsar pa dri mas ma gos
T02D1261:304a-32: pa ma chad pa tha dad pa ma yin pa
T02D1261:304a-33: srin gyis so btab pa ma yin pa shin tu
T02D1261:304a-34: ring ba ma yin pas bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1261:304a-35: bi dhi ka'i shar du kha blta zhing sbyin pa
T02D1261:304a-36: dang gshin rje nas nub tu kha blta ba dang
T02D1261:304a-37: / byang du rtse mo bstan la /
T02D1261:304a-38: me nas shar du rtse mo bstan par bya'o //
T02D1261:304a-39: de nas rang gi lha'i sa bon las thab khung
T02D1261:304a-40: bskyed la de nas me 'bar ba de'i dbus su
T02D1261:304a-41: re pha dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa
T02D1261:304a-42: dang po mchog gi thugs kyi gzugs la /
T02D1261:304a-43: aom yongs su gyur pa'i padma la gnas pa'i yi
T02D1261:304a-44: ge h'um las skyes pa kha dog ser po dbu
T02D1261:304b-0: skra'i thor tshugs can @304b g-yas na bgrang phreng dang
T02D1261:304b-1: mi 'jigs pa / phyag g-yon na spyi blugs dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1261:304b-2: gsus pa 'phyang ba na bza' ser po can tshangs sku dang ldan pa //
T02D1261:304b-3: 'od zer ser zhing gdan ser po la sems dpa'i
T02D1261:304b-4: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i me lha rnam par
T02D1261:304b-5: bsgoms la / nam mkha' la yang ye shes sems
T02D1261:304b-6: dpa' bltas la sngags 'don zhing spyan drang bar bya
T02D1261:304b-7: bsgoms la / ste / aom aa gna ye ma
T02D1261:304b-8: h'a te dza sarba k'a m'a rtha pra s'a dha
T02D1261:304b-9: bsgoms la / ste / k'a / ka ru na
T02D1261:304b-10: kri t+sa tva aa rtha aa smi na sanni hi
T02D1261:304b-11: to bha ba zhes bya bas so //
T02D1261:304b-12: de nas ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs te /
T02D1261:304b-13: de nyid gsum gyi dbus su chud pa'i takki'i sngags kyis /
T02D1261:304b-14: mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su padma'i gdan la dgod
T02D1261:304b-15: cing de dang lhan cig lhag pa'i bgegs h'u% yig
T02D1261:304b-16: gis bskrad la / chu snod dang po las ku
T02D1261:304b-17: sha'i gtsang bsrel gyis dang po'i bzed zhal du bsad
T02D1261:304b-19: de nas mthe ba mdzub gnyis kyis snod gnyis pa
T02D1261:304b-20: na gnas pa nas me tog dang bcas pa'i chu
T02D1261:304b-21: blugs la de bzhin du 'thor 'thung lan gsum dbul
T02D1261:304b-22: bar bya'o // de nas aom dza: h'u% ba% ho:/
T02D1261:304b-23: kham ram pra ba ra sa tk'a ra aa rgham
T02D1261:304b-24: pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod
T02D1261:304b-25: la rdo rje rtse mo kha phye nas chu snod
T02D1261:304b-26: gsum pa nas snod gnyis par mchod yon lan gsum
T02D1261:304b-27: gyi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1261:304b-28: de nas aom ni ri ti h'u% kham pra ba
T02D1261:304b-29: ra sa tk'a ra p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha sv'a
T02D1261:304b-30: h'a / zhes bya ba 'dis de na gnas pa'i
T02D1261:304b-31: chu nyid las mtheb mdzub sbyar bas me tog dang
T02D1261:304b-32: bcas pa blangs te de bzhin du dal bas lan
T02D1261:304b-33: gsum gyi bar du zhabs la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1261:304b-34: de nas aom aa gna ye a'a dyi by'a di
T02D1261:304b-35: by'a bi sh'a bi sh'a ma h'a shri ye ha
T02D1261:304b-36: bhy'a ka by'a ba ha n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:304b-37: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis de bkug la dam tshig
T02D1261:304b-38: gi me la gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang
T02D1261:304b-40: 'di'i mig dang lus la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1261:304b-42: yang bsang gtor la sogs pa dang cho ga'i rjes
T02D1261:304b-43: su 'jug pa sngar brjod pa'i sngags nyid kyis mchod
T02D1261:304b-44: pa rnam pa lngas mchod la yang dag par grub
T02D1261:304b-45: pa'i me la mngon par bstod par bya'o //
T02D1261:305a-0: de'i rjes la gser ram zangs sam mchod sbyin gyi shing las byas @305a * //
T02D1261:305a-1: pa skyes bu'i mtheb sor gyi tshad dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1261:305a-2: sor nyi shu bzhi pa chang zungs la rdo rjes
T02D1261:305a-3: mtshan pa rnal 'byor dbyug pa'i steng du ni sor
T02D1261:305a-4: bzhi pa la gru bzhi pa zabs su sor gnyis
T02D1261:305a-5: brus pa dang po mchog gi rdo rjes mtshan pa
T02D1261:305a-6: gung mo'i tshad kyis ro 'bab pa'i bug pa dang
T02D1261:305a-7: ldan pa / de'i mchu nas 'og tu sor bzhi
T02D1261:305a-8: pa la dbus su rtse mor thug pa dang bcas
T02D1261:305a-9: ldan pa / pa ste / rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1261:305a-10: rtse gsum rdo rje'i dbus su padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1261:305a-11: dbyug pa'i 'og tu ni sor drug pa'i rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'i blugs gzar te /
T02D1261:305a-12: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i dbyug pa la rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02D1261:305a-13: rgyar ni sor gnyis pa padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa
T02D1261:305a-14: la zabs su sor gang tsam brkos la dbus su
T02D1261:305a-15: rdo rje mchog gi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dgang gzar
T02D1261:305a-16: / de'i kha la ni rang gi lha'i sa bon
T02D1261:305a-17: dang me'i khar yang ram yig bkod la pus mo'i
T02D1261:305a-18: nang nas lag pa kha gyen du bltas te /
T02D1261:305a-19: lag pa g-yon pas mar gyis bkang ba'i blugs gzar
T02D1261:305a-20: blangs la lag pa g-yas pa kha sbub ste blugs
T02D1261:305a-21: gzar la bskyon pa'i dgang gzar blangs te /
T02D1261:305a-22: de'i blugs gzar mar gyis bkang la aom aa g+na ye /
T02D1261:305a-23: aom aa mu kam sya pu shtim ku ru aom /
T02D1261:305a-24: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bsreg rdzas la bsregs pas me lha'i kha cung zhig dbye ba'o //
T02D1261:305a-25: de nas dgang gzar dang blugs gzar du bcas pa bskor ba byas la /
T02D1261:305a-26: aom na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D1261:305a-27: aa g+na ye aom aa mu kam sya pu shtim
T02D1261:305a-28: ku ru aom zhes brjod la rdzogs pa'i sreg pa
T02D1261:305a-29: bya'o // de nas sngags pas mnyam par gzhag pas
T02D1261:305a-30: me'i kha dog dang dri dang sgra'i rnam pas me'i
T02D1261:305a-31: mtshan nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba'i ltas brtag
T02D1261:305a-32: bya'o // par bya ste / me ni rtse gcig 'bar ba yis //
T02D1261:305a-33: sbyor ba thams cad byed par 'gyur //
T02D1261:305a-34: g-yo ba med pas mnyam 'bar la //
T02D1261:305a-35: rtse gnyis pa ni 'bring por shes //
T02D1261:305a-36: gal te 'bar ba rtse bzhi la //
T02D1261:305a-37: legs par mnyam nas mthong na ni //
T02D1261:305a-38: de na rtag tu sa rnams kyi //
T02D1261:305a-39: rgya mtsho bzhi yi ska rags so //
T02D1261:305a-40: kun da zla mtshungs snum pa yi //
T02D1261:305a-41: bee d'u rya gzugs bzang po'i 'od //
T02D1261:305a-42: du ba med cing dri bral me //
T02D1261:305b-0: nad med rigs rgyud @305b 'phel bar byed //
T02D1261:305b-1: chu shal nor bu dang mtshungs pa'i //
T02D1261:305b-2: kha ba yi ni rnam pa 'dra //
T02D1261:305b-3: bu ya ra ga lta bu yis //
T02D1261:305b-4: sdig pa 'phrog cing dngos grub ste //
T02D1261:305b-5: lham bu chu shel dbang po'i gzhu //
T02D1261:305b-6: glog dang byu ru dang mtshungs la //
T02D1261:305b-7: gser sbyangs aindra n'i la dang //
T02D1261:305b-8: nyi 'od rgyal srid longs spyod ster //
T02D1261:305b-10: ma la ti dris bsil dang ldan //
T02D1261:305b-11: ga pur aa ru na yi dri //
T02D1261:305b-12: rig pa'i gnas kyi bdag po gter //
T02D1261:305b-13: glang chen rta dang khyu mchog sgra //
T02D1261:305b-14: dur ba keng gi la yi sgra //
T02D1261:305b-15: yul 'jug dus kyi sbyin sreg gis //
T02D1261:305b-16: dgra rnam 'joms shing rnam par rgyal //
T02D1261:305b-17: pi wang gling bu me dang 'ga' //
T02D1261:305b-18: padma dud dang ka ha'i sgra //
T02D1261:305b-19: shin tu zab cing shin tu snum //
T02D1261:305b-20: sgra med mes ni bde ba ster //
T02D1261:305b-21: dpal byed gdugs dang dung dang pad //
T02D1261:305b-22: rtse mo gsum po dag gi tshul //
T02D1261:305b-23: rgyal mtshan rnga yab rdo rje mchog //
T02D1261:305b-24: klu drung rta dang glang po'i tshul //
T02D1261:305b-25: mar bsreg dgang gzar rnam pa dang //
T02D1261:305b-26: gdan bzang nyi ma'i rnam pa dang //
T02D1261:305b-27: sgra med g-yas nas skor byed cing //
T02D1261:305b-28: gong bu gcig pas don chen ster //
T02D1261:305b-29: dge ba yi ni mtshan nyid do //
T02D1261:305b-30: g-yo zhing mngon du phyogs shing 'bar //
T02D1261:305b-31: rtse gsum pa la du bar bcas //
T02D1261:305b-33: lus ngag yid la nad rnams byed //
T02D1261:305b-34: gang zhig hom mkhan bsreg pa'i tshul //
T02D1261:305b-35: me lce rtse gsum ltag pa 'dra //
T02D1261:305b-36: me lce chad cing 'od zer bral //
T02D1261:305b-37: langs na de yis 'chi ba ste //
T02D1261:305b-38: me gang myur du g-yo byed cing //
T02D1261:305b-39: myur du dgod cing ni shtha ra //
T02D1261:305b-40: g-yon nas myur du 'thor byed cing //
T02D1261:305b-41: myur du sa la reg par byed //
T02D1261:305b-42: 'di ni shing mdzer thig le gnag / rigs rgyud nyams shing 'khu bar smra //
T02D1261:305b-43: rgyal po'i bzhon par nyams pa'am //
T02D1261:305b-44: yang na de yi dpon po 'chi //
T02D1261:305b-45: mdog bral du ba sprin nag dang //
T02D1261:305b-46: sngo bsangs mdog dang shin tu bsres //
T02D1261:305b-47: rtsub dang pa la sa dmar 'dra //
T02D1261:305b-48: 'dod pa'i don ni nyams par byed //
T02D1261:305b-49: de yang rnyang dri dri ma ngan //
T02D1261:305b-50: chu skyes srog chags dri dang ldan //
T02D1261:305b-51: rdul dang byi la ma he dang /
T02D1261:305b-52: ce spyang gtum pa dri yi cha //
T02D1261:305b-53: bya rog sbrul gyi dri dag gam //
T02D1261:305b-54: bshang ba du ma'i dri dang ldan //
T02D1261:306a-2: gtso bo rgud par smra bar byed //
T02D1261:306a-3: tsa ta tsa ta'i sgra la sogs //
T02D1261:306a-6: rdo rje sgra yis nor nyams byed //
T02D1261:306a-7: ral gri'i rtse mor zur 'dra dang //
T02D1261:306a-8: rnga mo ba lang mgo dang mtshungs //
T02D1261:306a-10: gal te sbyin sreg 'di brjod na //
T02D1261:306a-11: mi dge ba yi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1261:306a-12: de ltar shes par byas nas gal te sngags pas
T02D1261:306a-13: mi dge ba'i ltas mthong ba de lta na ni
T02D1261:306a-14: las thams cad pa'i chus lan bdun gtor zhing /
T02D1261:306a-15: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis sbyangs la bsrungs te /
T02D1261:306a-16: mar gyis bsregs pas lan bdun bsreg par bya zhing //
T02D1261:306a-17: yang snga ma bzhin du bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1261:306a-18: de ltar bgegs med par byas nas yang me la
T02D1261:306a-19: bsreg rdzas dang mar dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gang
T02D1261:306a-20: ba gcig gam gsum mam lan bdun du 'byor tshad
T02D1261:306a-21: kyis blugs gzar dgang gzar ldan pas dbul bar bya
T02D1261:306a-22: ste / aom na ma: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so //
T02D1261:306a-23: de nas blugs gzar gyis mar gyi sreg blugs gsum mam bdun bsregs la /
T02D1261:306a-31: n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i yam shing gi shing
T02D1261:306a-32: 'o ma can las skyes pa'i shing sar pa lo
T02D1261:306a-33: ma gnyis dang bcas pa mnyam par bcad pa dbus
T02D1261:306a-34: kyi cha nas lag pas bzung nas rtse mo gnyis
T02D1261:306a-35: mnyam par gshibs la bdud rtsi dang dri ser po'i
T02D1261:306a-36: chus bkrus la zho dang 'o ma dang mar la
T02D1261:306a-38: ming med dang mthe bos bzung la yam shing rtse gcig pas bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1261:306a-39: yang na seng ldeng dang nyi ma'i shing dang pa la ksha dang /
T02D1261:306a-48: kha lce las skyes pa shin tu gsar zhing drang
T02D1261:306a-49: la lo ma dang bcas pa'i yam shing phyogs drang
T02D1261:306a-50: po nas rang rang gi sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o
T02D1261:306a-51: // ya yo can dang skra 'dab can dang bral ba rtse mo nyams pa dang /
T02D1261:306a-52: pags pa dang bral ba dang ring ba dang thung ba dang sbom pa dang phra ba dang /
T02D1261:306a-53: yo ba dang rtse mo khrag dang srin gyis zos pa dang /
T02D1261:306b-0: srog @306b chags dang bcas pa ni spang bar bya'o //
T02D1261:306b-1: de'i rjes la yam shing gis bsreg pa'i me la
T02D1261:306b-2: mar dang mar khu ma nyams pa dang khre dang
T02D1261:306b-3: so ba dang d'ur ba dang ku sha la sogs
T02D1261:306b-4: pa'i bsreg rdzas gzhan bsreg par bya ba sngags brjod
T02D1261:306b-6: sngags so so'i mtha' ru aom che ge mo rgyas
T02D1261:306b-7: par gyis shig / aom zhes bskul ba'i sngags kyis
T02D1261:306b-8: dor bar bya'o // de la sngags kyi tshig ni aom badzr'a ya dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-10: aom bo dhi bri ksh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-12: aom badzra la t'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-14: aom badzra ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-15: n+ya gro dha la sogs pa'i 'o ma can gyi'o //
T02D1261:306b-16: aom sa h'a g'a h'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1261:306b-18: de ltar na gzhan la yang ste /
T02D1261:306b-19: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sarba p'a bam da ha sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-21: aom badzra pu shta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-22: ma nyams pa'i khre la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D1261:306b-23: aom sarba sam ba de sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-24: so ba dang bza' ba mchog gi'o //
T02D1261:306b-25: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-27: aom aa pra ti ha t'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-29: badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-31: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-33: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1261:306b-35: aom badzra gha sma r'i sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:306b-37: rdzas gzhan la yang h'u% gi de kho na nyid gsum las skyes pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1261:306b-38: de la gal te yod na 'du ba'i rdzas de thams cad ni me lha'i zhal du dbul lo //
T02D1261:306b-39: ku sha la sogs pa'i bsreg rdzas ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1261:306b-40: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o //
T02D1261:306b-41: me tog ni spyi bor ro //
T02D1261:306b-44: bsang tor ni sku dang zhabs dag la'o //
T02D1261:306b-45: mar me dang mchod yon dang lha ba shos ni mdun du'o //
T02D1261:306b-46: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar med par gyur na lag
T02D1261:306b-47: pa'i mtheb mdzub kyi sbyor bas bsreg rdzas thams cad
T02D1261:306b-48: bsreg par bya'o // de la sor mo lnga'i sbyor bas ni rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs so //
T02D1261:306b-49: gung mo dang ming med dang mthe bo'i sbyor ba cig shos kyis sreg blugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1261:306b-50: de nas me lha la mthor 'thung la sogs pa byin la /
T02D1261:306b-51: me de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
T02D1261:306b-52: shes kyi mer gyur pas chos kyi dbyings su gyur
T02D1261:307a-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1261:307a-2: las ma lus pa'i gnas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1261:307a-3: mer bltas la // de'i snying ga'i padma nyi ma'i
T02D1261:307a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la rang gi lha'i sa bon
T02D1261:307a-5: grub pa mtshan ma dang sa bon las yongs su
T02D1261:307a-6: gyur pa las dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang dkyil
T02D1261:307a-7: 'khor gyi bdag por bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1261:307a-8: thams cad kyi ngo bo dpal kye rdo rjer bsgoms
T02D1261:307a-9: mer bltas la // la / ye shes kyi dkyil
T02D1261:307a-10: 'khor yang spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs
T02D1261:307a-12: aom ae hye hi bha ga w'an ni ha bha ga tyam /
T02D1261:307a-13: sa ma ye na tsa aa ndha di kam tsa /
T02D1261:307a-14: pra ti tse dam me zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so //
T02D1261:307a-15: de nas bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa bya zhing
T02D1261:307a-16: 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor la sogs pa phul la
T02D1261:307a-18: zhes bya ba 'dis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la /
T02D1261:307a-19: ye shes kyi 'khor lo dang dam tshig gi 'khor
T02D1261:307a-20: lo gnyis lhan cig tu gyur cing chu dang 'o
T02D1261:307a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor de'i lus dang mig la sogs
T02D1261:307a-23: pa rnam par sbyang ba dang dbang bskur ba yang
T02D1261:307a-24: byas la / slar yang bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung
T02D1261:307a-25: la sogs pa dang mchod pa dang bstod pa'i bar
T02D1261:307a-27: lce la h'u% yig bstims te /
T02D1261:307a-28: rang rang gi sngags kyis cig shos kyi sreg blugs kyang sngon bzhin du phul la /
T02D1261:307a-29: yo byad thams cad kyi rdzas bsres la /
T02D1261:307a-30: sreg blugs gcig gam gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu
T02D1261:307a-31: rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong phrag brgya
T02D1261:307a-32: ji ltar rnyed pa snga ma bzhin du 'bul lo
T02D1261:307a-33: // de nas yang bsreg rdzas thams cad lha rnams
T02D1261:307a-34: kyi ljags la legs par lhung bar mos par bya'o
T02D1261:307a-35: // // dbang gi dus su ni yon phul la
T02D1261:307a-36: slob ma rnams kyi lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bo
T02D1261:307a-37: so so nas gzung la rang ngam gzhan gyis sreg
T02D1261:307a-38: blugs gsum mam bdun byin la yod par gyur na
T02D1261:307a-39: // // / rgyal po sa'i bdag po dang dge 'dun dang lha mo dang phyogs skyong ba dang /
T02D1261:307a-40: bdag nyid rgyas par bya ba'i don du sreg blugs bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1261:307a-41: de ltar ci rnyed pa'i sbyin sreg byas la mthar
T02D1261:307a-42: ni rigs kyi snying po gsum mam bdun nam nyi
T02D1261:307b-0: shu rtsa gcig tu mar gyi sreg @307b blugs kyis
T02D1261:307b-2: de nas rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs phul la 'thor 'thung
T02D1261:307b-3: dang phye ma dang bral ba'i ta mbo la dang
T02D1261:307b-4: / gos la sogs pa phul la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la /
T02D1261:307b-5: de nas lha de dag thams cad la tsandan la
T02D1261:307b-6: sogs pa dang mar la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis dga'
T02D1261:307b-7: zhing mgu nas rang gi lus kyi sprin spros pas
T02D1261:307b-8: rin po che dang bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa
T02D1261:307b-10: bsgrub bya la dbang bskur zhing rdo rje'i lus su
T02D1261:307b-11: byas la de'i khang pa yang rin po che du
T02D1261:307b-12: mas yongs su gang bar bsgoms la ral gri la
T02D1261:307b-13: sogs pa'i dngos grub kyang bskyed cing /
T02D1261:307b-14: rang gi lus kyi sprin rang nyid la yang dag par 'dus par blta'o //
T02D1261:307b-15: de nas sngags pas me tog gi thal mo sbyar
T02D1261:307b-16: la mnyam par gzhag ste lus btud la dman pa
T02D1261:307b-17: dang stong pa'i skyon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang
T02D1261:307b-18: / mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir mkhyen cing bzod par gsol bar bya ste /
T02D1261:307b-19: bcom ldan bdag la nus med pas //
T02D1261:307b-20: ma 'byor pa dang ma rig dang //
T02D1261:307b-21: dman pa'am ni lhag pa ste //
T02D1261:307b-22: gang bgyis de khyod bzod par gsol //
T02D1261:307b-24: de nas badzra satva zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:307b-25: aom khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
T02D1261:307b-26: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1261:307b-27: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02D1261:307b-28: slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1261:307b-29: aom a'a: h'u% badzra ma: zhes brjod la rang gi
T02D1261:307b-30: 'dod pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar bya'o
T02D1261:307b-31: // de nas thab khung dang me lha sngon bzhin
T02D1261:307b-32: du bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa phul
T02D1261:307b-34: rim pa bzhin du yo byad lhag ma bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1261:307b-35: de nas rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs phul la //
T02D1261:307b-36: bsang gtor la sogs pa yang phul te //
T02D1261:307b-37: tampo la dang gos la sogs pa'i mchod pa yang byas la /
T02D1261:307b-38: dril bu yang dkrol zhing bstod par bya'o //
T02D1261:307b-39: de nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol zhing
T02D1261:307b-40: bzod pa phul nas badzra satva zhes lan gsum bskul
T02D1261:307b-41: la / sv'a nva ntse ba pa r'a rtha nytsa s'a dhi tam ga tstsha /
T02D1261:307b-42: ha bya bhu ka aa ga mi shv'a pi ya th'a k'a l'e //
T02D1261:308a-0: sarba siddhi ku ru shva mi zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis me lha gshegs su gsol @308a * //
T02D1261:308a-2: / de nas me nang du snod legs par bkrus
T02D1261:308a-3: par bsreg rdzas kyi lhag ma mar dang 'o ma
T02D1261:308a-4: dang sbrang rtsi dang sha kha rar ldan pa'i thug
T02D1261:308a-6: gnyen 'dab rnams la yang cung zad sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1261:308a-7: de'i rjes la yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lan bdun
T02D1261:308a-8: brjod la dge ba yang bla na med pa yang
T02D1261:308a-9: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos
T02D1261:308a-11: de la 'di ni yi ge brgya pa'i sngags so //
T02D1261:308a-12: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D1261:308a-14: badzra satva tve no pa ti shtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D1261:308a-15: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1261:308a-16: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1261:308a-17: aa nu rakto me bhya ba /
T02D1261:308a-18: sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsi ttam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D1261:308a-20: bha ga w'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra
T02D1261:308a-21: m'a me mu nytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa
T02D1261:308a-22: ma ya satva a'a:/ 'dir zhar la 'ongs pa'i dbang
T02D1261:308a-23: gis zhi ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho
T02D1261:308a-25: de la nad dang gnod pa dang skar mda' ltung
T02D1261:308a-26: ba'i gnod pa dang bgegs dang nyon mongs pa dang
T02D1261:308a-27: sdig pas zin pa'i bdag gam gzhan rnams zhi bar
T02D1261:308a-29: mngon par shes pa dang thar pa bsgrub pa'i phyir yang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1261:308a-30: de la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su dkar po
T02D1261:308a-31: la rgyar khru gang brko zhing zabs su ni sor
T02D1261:308a-32: bcu gnyis te / dbus su ni padma 'dab ma
T02D1261:308a-33: brgyad pa sor bcu drug pa la gnas pa'i rdo
T02D1261:308a-34: rje rtse mo lnga pa sor brgyad pa rtse mo
T02D1261:308a-36: steng du ni sor bzhi pa'i bar bzhag pa rgya
T02D1261:308a-37: dang dpangs su yang sor bzhi pa'i bi dhi kas
T02D1261:308a-38: bskor ba'i thab khung zlum po byas la 'jim pa
T02D1261:308a-39: dkar pos byug cing dkyil 'khor gyi sa la lci
T02D1261:308a-40: bas kyang nye bar byugs la /
T02D1261:308a-41: yang de gnyi ga tsandan dkar po'i dri bdud rtsi
T02D1261:308a-42: lnga dang bcas pas byug cing me tog dkar po
T02D1261:308a-43: bzang pos kyang mngon par gtor bar bya'o //
T02D1261:308a-44: rdul tshon gyis kyang thab khung bya'o //
T02D1261:308a-45: gser la sogs pa'i snod du dri dkar po dang
T02D1261:308a-46: nas dang 'o ma dang bcas pa'i chus bkang la
T02D1261:308a-47: sv'a h'a'i mtha' can gyi sngags kyis sngar bzhin bzla
T02D1261:308a-48: bar bya'o // 'o ma can gyi shing ngam 'brog
T02D1261:308a-49: gi lci ba'i bud shing dang zho mar dang sbrang
T02D1261:308a-50: rtsi dang 'o ma dang nas dang til dang l'a
T02D1261:308a-51: dz'a dang pri yang ku dang tsandan dang 'bras s'a
T02D1261:308a-52: lu'i zan dang d'ur ba sngon po dang /
T02D1261:308b-0: me @308b tog dkar po grus pa dang ke sa ra'i me tog dang /
T02D1261:308b-1: aa mra'i lo ma dang ni ra ya ba la
T02D1261:308b-2: sogs pa'i dri zhim po rnams kyang bsreg cing pa
T02D1261:308b-3: la sha la sogs pa sor bcu gnyis pa la
T02D1261:308b-4: sbom pa ma yin pa mtheb mdzub kyi tshad tsam
T02D1261:308b-5: rtse mo'i cha bdud rtsi dang dri dkar po dang
T02D1261:308b-7: sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma dang mar la rtse mo gnyis bsnyugs la /
T02D1261:308b-8: lhag ma ni sngar gsungs pa'i yam shing gi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1261:308b-9: mchod sbyin gyi shing las byung ba 'am nor bu
T02D1261:308b-10: las byung ba'am tha mal pa'am bram ze'i me blangs
T02D1261:308b-12: me lha sku mdog dkar po na bza' dkar po
T02D1261:308b-13: mnabs pa thor tshugs dkar po la me tog dkar
T02D1261:308b-14: po dang ldan zhing byams pa dang snying rje dang
T02D1261:308b-15: ldan pa / padma'i gdan la bzhugs shing zhal byang ngam shar du phyogs shing yid zhi ba ste /
T02D1261:308b-16: nya'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te sngags pa sngar langs te /
T02D1261:308b-17: sngags thams cad kyi mthar ni sv'a h'a aa mu ka sya sh'i ntam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:308b-18: zhes yang dag par bskul zhing sngags rab tu bton te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1261:308b-19: de nas mar dang bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i rdzas
T02D1261:308b-20: kyi sa dga' zhing mgu nas lha rnams rang gi
T02D1261:308b-21: lus kyis sprin gyi tshogs spros te /
T02D1261:308b-22: ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i rin po che'i bum
T02D1261:308b-23: pa bsnams pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya dbang bskur zhing
T02D1261:308b-24: mi 'dod pa'i nad la sogs pa bor nas /
T02D1261:308b-25: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrubs te rang gi lus kyi sprin rang nyid la 'dus shing /
T02D1261:308b-26: rnam par gnas te bya ba byas par blta'o //
T02D1261:308b-27: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D1261:308b-28: ral gri dang 'khor lo dang mda' dang rin po
T02D1261:308b-29: che dang padma dang gter chen po dang bcud dang
T02D1261:308b-30: bcud len dang rgyal srid la sogs pa bsgrub par
T02D1261:308b-31: bya ba'i phyir ni bdag tha mal pa'am pha rol
T02D1261:308b-32: tha mal pas zla ba nya nas brtsams te rgyas
T02D1261:308b-34: de la dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su sa gzhi
T02D1261:308b-35: ser po la khru do ba thabs su ni khru
T02D1261:308b-36: gang ba khyer gyi bar la sor brgyad dpangs su
T02D1261:308b-37: yang sor brgyad pa'i be dhi kas bskor ba la
T02D1261:308b-38: / dbus na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la rdo rje rin po che dang ldan pa /
T02D1261:308b-39: rin po che zur brgyad pa lta bu'am /
T02D1261:309a-0: zur bzhi pa lta bur brkos la thab khung byas te sa mdog ser @309a * //
T02D1261:309a-1: po dang dri dang bdud rtsis thab khung dang de'i sa phyogs nye bar byugs la /
T02D1261:309a-2: me tog ser po'am me tog khra bo dgram par bya'o //
T02D1261:309a-3: bud shing ni 'brog gi lci ba ma gtogs par
T02D1261:309a-4: sngar brjod pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o
T02D1261:309a-5: // lhag ma ni las thams cad pa'i cho gar gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02D1261:309a-6: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D1261:309a-7: bsad pa dang skam pa dang bskrad pa dang sdang
T02D1261:309a-8: ba dang rengs pa dang rmongs pa dang lus skems
T02D1261:309a-9: pa la sogs pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1261:309a-10: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1261:309a-11: de la dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su rtsub cing
T02D1261:309a-12: skam pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'i sa gzhi nag po
T02D1261:309a-13: la sor nyi shu pa zabs su sor bcu pa
T02D1261:309a-14: dbus su ni rtse gsum pa'i rtse mor sor brgyad
T02D1261:309a-15: pa'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1261:309a-16: steng du sor gsum por la zhed dang dpangs su
T02D1261:309a-17: ni sor gsum pa kha khyer gzhol bas bskor ba'i
T02D1261:309a-18: bi dhi ka'am mgo byang du bltas pa'i zur gsum
T02D1261:309a-19: nag po'i thab khung byas la /
T02D1261:309a-20: sa bdag dang dur khrod kyi thal ba dang bong
T02D1261:309a-21: bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i lci ba ji
T02D1261:309a-22: snyed pas byugs la dri mi zhim pa dang /
T02D1261:309a-23: me tog sngon po dang dmar po dang so ba'i 'bru la sogs pas dgram par bya'o //
T02D1261:309a-24: de la sngar brjod pa'i snod du dri ngan pa'i chu dang ko tra ba dang /
T02D1261:309a-25: mi dang ba lang dang bong bu'i chu me tog
T02D1261:309a-26: dang bcas pa la sngags yi ge phat kyi mtha'
T02D1261:309a-27: yis sngar bzhin du yongs su bzlas la g-yas kyi
T02D1261:309a-28: char yongs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1261:309a-29: yungs kar ser po dang 'bru mar tshan de dang me tog dang tshva dang ske tshe dang /
T02D1261:309a-30: dur khrod kyi thal ba dang /
T02D1261:309a-31: rkang pa'i rdul dang nim pa'i lo ma dang bong
T02D1261:309a-32: bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i lci ba dang
T02D1261:309a-34: bya rog la sogs pa rnams kyi dang byi la'i gcin rtug dang /
T02D1261:309a-36: gseg ma dang rus pa'i phye ma dang khrag so
T02D1261:309a-37: ru dang sha dang dug dang khrag dang ske tshe
T02D1261:309a-38: dang smyo ba'i 'dab ma'i khu bas sbyar la /
T02D1261:309a-39: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bzlas pa'i chu dang /
T02D1261:309a-40: thal ba dang bsnun pa dang sol ba dang dug
T02D1261:309a-41: la sogs pa dang bsres la rdzas 'di rnams kyis
T02D1261:309a-42: dgra'i sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la bsreg rdzas bya'o
T02D1261:309b-0: // mi tshil gyi mar me yang g-yon gyi @309b char bzhag go //
T02D1261:309b-1: bud shing ni tsha ba dang tsher ma can dang /
T02D1261:309b-3: dring ba dang shing las skyes pa'am /
T02D1261:309b-4: yang na dur gyi shing ngam bong bu dang rnga mo'i lci ba skam po'o //
T02D1261:309b-5: nim pa dang seng ldeng dang ko bhi dha dang
T02D1261:309b-6: bha la ta ka dang ma da na'i shing las
T02D1261:309b-7: skyes pa'am / tsha ba dang tsher ma dang bcas pa'am /
T02D1261:309b-8: kha ba'i shing las skyes pa'am dur khrod kyi shing
T02D1261:309b-9: las skyes pa rtsa ba'i cha nas bcad la yam
T02D1261:309b-10: shing bya ste / sor bcu pa la me tog
T02D1261:309b-11: dang bcas pa rtse mo rno ba 'bru mar tshan
T02D1261:309b-12: de la rtse mo gnyis bsnyug go //
T02D1261:309b-13: dur khrod kyi mi rus las skyes pa'am //
T02D1261:309b-14: dur khrod kyi shing las skyes pa'am /
T02D1261:309b-16: gdol ba'i khyim nas byung ba'i me yis so //
T02D1261:309b-17: kha dog nag po skra gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D1261:309b-18: mig dmar ba mche ba gtsigs pa gdong khro gnyer dang bcas pa /
T02D1261:309b-21: bong thung ba gos nag po gyon pa /
T02D1261:309b-22: mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1261:309b-23: 'bar zhing kha gdangs pa'i me lha'o //
T02D1261:309b-24: khro zhing gos sngon po bgos pa'i thor tshugs me tog dang ldan pa /
T02D1261:309b-25: gos dang khrag dang chus brlan par byas shing khengs pa'i mig can /
T02D1261:309b-26: khro gnyer gyi gdong dang ldan pa rkang pa g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan pa /
T02D1261:309b-27: so yis so la mnan cing stan dang bral te
T02D1261:309b-28: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan gyi lto ba la tsog bur
T02D1261:309b-29: 'dug pa'am / khro bo'i skyil krung bcings la kha
T02D1261:309b-30: lho ru blta zhing snying rje'i khros pas dkon mchog
T02D1261:309b-31: gsum la gnod pa'i dgra bzlog par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1261:309b-32: mar ngo gang yang rung ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1261:309b-33: nyin phyed dam mtshan phyed na khro ba nyid kyis tshad mar byas te /
T02D1261:309b-34: pus mo gnyis las phyi rol tu lag pa byas
T02D1261:309b-35: la lag pa g-yos pas mtshon rnon po blangs te
T02D1261:309b-36: / bsreg bya la bcad cing bcad cing lag pa g-yon gyis sdigs mdzub byas te /
T02D1261:309b-37: phat aa mu ka sya aa bhi tsa ram ku
T02D1261:309b-38: ru phat ces pa'i sngags brjod la bsreg par bya
T02D1261:309b-39: ste / mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1261:309b-40: sdang ba la ni khyad par du bskul ba'i mtshams su /
T02D1261:309b-42: h'u% aa mu kam bi de sha ya /
T02D1261:309b-43: bskrad pa la ni aom kham sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:309b-44: h'u% aa mu ka au tstsha tra na ya h'u%/
T02D1261:309b-45: rengs pa dang rmongs pa dag la ni aom h'u% h'u% sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:310a-0: @310a * // boo sha ta aa mu kam stvam mbha ya mo ha ya boo sha ta /
T02D1261:310a-1: bsad pa la ni aom ghu sv'a h'a /
T02D1261:310a-2: phat aa mu kam m'a ra ya phat /
T02D1261:310a-3: de ltar gzhan la yang ngo //
T02D1261:310a-4: sbyin sreg gi lha dgyes te rang gi snying ga'i
T02D1261:310a-5: sa bon las khro bo spros te rdo rje zhags
T02D1261:310a-6: pa dang me mdag gi char gyis bsgrub bya la
T02D1261:310a-7: bkang zhing mtshon cha du mas btab cing srog dang
T02D1261:310a-8: bral te bde bar gshegs pa nyid la sbyar nas
T02D1261:310a-9: spros pa rnams bdag nyid la bsdus par blta'o //
T02D1261:310a-10: 'di ni mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D1261:310a-11: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang
T02D1261:310a-12: lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci
T02D1261:310a-13: dang bud med kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa dang
T02D1261:310a-14: mi'i dbang po la sogs pa rnams dbang du bya
T02D1261:310a-15: ba dang dgug pa'i phyir dbang gi sbyin sreg gam
T02D1261:310a-16: dgug pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1261:310a-17: de la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs sam dgug pa la ni nub nyid du ste /
T02D1261:310a-18: sa phyogs dmar po bha ga'i rnam pa'am zla ba
T02D1261:310a-19: phyed pa'i rnam pa la dbus su rdo rje padmas
T02D1261:310a-21: dgug pa la ni dbus su rdo rje rtse gcig
T02D1261:310a-22: pa'i rnam pa'i rdo rje lcags kyus byin gyis brlabs
T02D1261:310a-23: pa ste / de gnyis ka yang zhi ba'i thab
T02D1261:310a-24: khu ba ltar brko zhing kha khyer la sogs pa'i
T02D1261:310a-25: tshad dang ldan pa'i thab khung byas te /
T02D1261:310a-26: sa dmar po dang dris nye bar bskus la me
T02D1261:310a-27: tog dmar pos kyang brgyan cing chu shing la sogs
T02D1261:310a-28: pa'i 'dab mas kyang dgab par bya'o //
T02D1261:310a-29: sngar brjod pa'i snod na gnas pa'i chu dang me
T02D1261:310a-30: tog dmar po dang drir ldan pa la yi ge
T02D1261:310a-31: ho'i mtha'i sngags kyis g-yon phyogs su bzla'o //
T02D1261:310a-32: dgug pa la ni g-yas phyogs su gzhag par bya
T02D1261:310a-33: zhing pri yang khu dang tsam pa ka dang pu
T02D1261:310a-34: nda r'i ka dang n'a ga ge sar dang ke
T02D1261:310a-35: sa la dang ku tsa la dang aa sho ka
T02D1261:310a-36: ste / nags las byung ba'i lo ma dang bcas
T02D1261:310a-37: pa sor lnga pa zhi ba'i skabs su gsungs pa'i
T02D1261:310a-38: skyon dang bral ba'i yam shing ngo //
T02D1261:310a-39: skyur ba'i 'bras bu dang autpala dmar po dang me tog dmar po'i 'bras bu ste /
T02D1261:310a-40: gzhan yang rang rang gi brtag pa las gsungs pa'i bsreg rdzas ni g-yas su'o //
T02D1261:310a-41: dgug pa la ni de dag nyid g-yon du ste /
T02D1261:310a-42: lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i tsher ma dang gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1261:310a-43: ni ma pa dang sgyur ba'i shing las skyes pa
T02D1261:310b-0: dang gzhan yang me tog @310b tu bcas pa'i bud
T02D1261:310b-2: dgug pa la ni tsher ma dang bcas pa'i bud shing ngo //
T02D1261:310b-3: me ni smad 'tshong ma'i khyim mam smad 'tshod ma
T02D1261:310b-4: ma yin pa gar mkhan gyi rigs kyi khyim gyi
T02D1261:310b-5: me'o // dgug pa la ni gar mkhan gyi shul lam lam po che'i me'o //
T02D1261:310b-6: kha dog dmar po'i 'od dang ldan pa'i me lha
T02D1261:310b-7: gdan dang bcas pa gos dmar po gyon pa mchod
T02D1261:310b-8: phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1261:310b-9: gos dmar po gyon cing cod pan la me tog gis dkris la /
T02D1261:310b-10: khro bo'i nga rgyal spangs la chags pa'i yid kyis rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02D1261:310b-11: kha nub tu phyogs pas so //
T02D1261:310b-12: dgug pa la ni cung zhing sngags pas kha gyen du bltas la /
T02D1261:310b-14: aom aa mu kam ba shim ku ru ho:/
T02D1261:310b-16: dza aa mu kam a'a k'a rsha ya dza: zhes pa'i sngags brjod la /
T02D1261:310b-17: nam phyed na dbang gi sbyin sreg gam /
T02D1261:310b-19: sbyin sreg gis lha mgu nas rang gi lus kyis sprin spro ste //
T02D1261:310b-20: me tog nag po dang dmar po kha bye ba
T02D1261:310b-21: las byas pa'i gzhu rna drung du bkang pa autpala'i
T02D1261:310b-22: sdong bu mda' yis bsgrub bya'i snying gar bsnun te
T02D1261:310b-23: dbang du byed pa dang dgug pa la ni autpala
T02D1261:310b-24: dmar po'i sdong bu'i zhags pas bcings shing me tog
T02D1261:310b-25: dmar po las byas pa'i lcags kyus snying gnas bzung
T02D1261:310b-26: ste bkug nas sgrub po'i rkang pa'i drung du gdab
T02D1261:310b-27: par byas nas rang gi lus kyi sprin rang nyid
T02D1261:310b-29: dbang dang dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D1261:310b-30: las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg ni ji ltar grags pa'i las rkyang bas bya'o //
T02D1261:310b-32: 'dis tshe 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mar la bsnyugs
T02D1261:310b-33: pa'i d'ur ba dang bcas pa bsreg par bya zhing
T02D1261:310b-34: bsrung ba'i don du ni de bzhin du til mar
T02D1261:310b-35: la bsnyugs te ku shas bsreg par bya zhing /
T02D1261:310b-36: rang 'dod pa'i lha bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1261:310b-37: sngags kyi mthar ni ji ltar yang dag par bskul ba'i tshig dang /
T02D1261:310b-38: rdzas dang bya ba dang bsgom pa dang sngags dang /
T02D1261:310b-39: sa bon la sogs pa'i khyad par yang sngon dang sngon du 'brang bas sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1261:310b-40: de ltar na ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshes dang dus dang ji ltar skabs yod pa'am /
T02D1261:310b-41: de la mos pas ji srid du mngon par 'dod
T02D1261:310b-42: pa'i zhi ba la sogs par gyur pa de srid
T02D1261:311a-2: tha mal gnas la rgyas pa bya //
T02D1261:311a-3: nad kun la ni zhi ba ste //
T02D1261:311a-4: sdang ba kun la gsad bya zhing //
T02D1261:311a-5: bdag gi don 'dod dbang gis bya //
T02D1261:311a-7: de nas phyi'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i sngags pas rdzas
T02D1261:311a-8: dang bdag dang lha rnams rnam par dag pa'i sgo
T02D1261:311a-9: nas bsam par bya zhing byams pa dang bzod pa
T02D1261:311a-10: dang brtson 'grus dang stong pa nyid dmigs par bya
T02D1261:311a-11: zhing / kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam
T02D1261:311a-12: pa'i bden pa dang kun 'byung gi bden pa la
T02D1261:311a-13: zhing / dgod par bya'o // nyan thos dang rang
T02D1261:311a-14: sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po dang lam dman
T02D1261:311a-15: pa dang 'bring dang lhag pas rnam par grol ba'i
T02D1261:311a-16: khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang 'grub par
T02D1261:311a-17: zhing / dgod par bya'o // bya'o // de yang /
T02D1261:311a-18: phyir ni rnam pa gsum ldan te //
T02D1261:311a-19: gnas gsum po la gsum gnas na //
T02D1261:311a-20: ham gi las rnams gsum po ni //
T02D1261:311a-21: 'grub par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D1261:311a-22: ham gi las ni mi shes par //
T02D1261:311a-23: gang dag gzhan du byed pa ni //
T02D1261:311a-24: sngags kyi ye shes spangs pa yis //
T02D1261:311a-25: rmongs pas 'bras bu thob pa med //
T02D1261:311a-27: de ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir
T02D1261:311a-28: sgrub pa po rnams la yun mi ring ba nyid
T02D1261:311a-30: slar yang myur du goms par bya ba'i phyir 'di ltar bsam par bya ste /
T02D1261:311a-31: 'di ltar skabs su sbyin sreg thams cad la ni
T02D1261:311a-32: gang 'di dag sa dang thab khung ku sha dang
T02D1261:311a-33: me tog dang bsreg rdzas dang snod dang chu dang
T02D1261:311a-34: bzang zhal blugs gzar dang dgang gzar dang yam ging
T02D1261:311a-35: dang bud shing dang me lha dang 'dod pa'i lha
T02D1261:311a-36: dang dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa
T02D1261:311a-37: thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag cing
T02D1261:311a-38: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'o zhes
T02D1261:311a-39: nges par bya'o // ham yig yan lag 'bras skyes pa //
T02D1261:311a-40: de las gzhan dag bshad pa ni //
T02D1261:311a-41: ma brjod na yang bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1261:311a-42: mkhas pas shes par byas te gzung //
T02D1261:311a-43: sa gzhi zhing sa 'phel bar byed //
T02D1261:311a-44: thab kyis khyim ni 'phel byed cing //
T02D1261:311a-45: mar gyis thams cad 'byor bar byed //
T02D1261:311a-46: yam shing gis ni gzi byin bskyed //
T02D1261:311b-0: shing gis lhag par @311b dpa' bar byed //
T02D1261:311b-1: ku shas srung ba thams cad byed //
T02D1261:311b-2: dkar pos sa gzhi zhi bar byed //
T02D1261:311b-3: khre yis rgyas par byed par brjod //
T02D1261:311b-4: til gyis sdig pa 'phrog par rigs //
T02D1261:311b-5: so bas nor dang so pa 'dren //
T02D1261:311b-6: sran mas stobs ni che bar byed //
T02D1261:311b-7: nas byin pas ni rlung gi shugs //
T02D1261:311b-9: gro yis nad rnams nyams pa dang //
T02D1261:311b-10: sbrang rtsi 'o mas shes rab ste //
T02D1261:311b-11: zho zan bde ba thams cad ster //
T02D1261:311b-12: 'dod pa'i lha dang me yis ni //
T02D1261:311b-13: de bzhin 'dod pa'i dngos grub ste //
T02D1261:311b-14: lhag mas las kyi rjes mthun par //
T02D1261:311b-15: zho sogs las ni byed par shes //
T02D1261:311b-16: blugs gzar shes rab gong ma thabs //
T02D1261:311b-17: de nyid sbyor ba gnyis med bsgom //
T02D1261:311b-18: de nas rnam par byung ba'i mar //
T02D1261:311b-19: ye shes chen po'i bdud rtsir byed //
T02D1261:311b-20: bdag dag rgyu dang mi rgyu dang //
T02D1261:311b-21: me lha de yis tshim par bya //
T02D1261:311b-22: de ltar gang zhig sbyin sreg byed //
T02D1261:311b-23: de ni 'dod pa'i snod du gyur //
T02D1261:311b-25: de ltar sbyin sreg gi cho ga byas nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1261:311b-26: de nas lha'i 'khor lo la mngon sum bzhin du bltas la /
T02D1261:311b-27: sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor la yang dag par mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D1261:311b-28: bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa byas nas bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1261:311b-29: de nas slob ma rnams la dbang sogs bsdu bar
T02D1261:311b-30: 'dod pa'i sngags pas rigs kyi gtso bo la bla
T02D1261:311b-31: ma byas te / 'chad par 'gyur ba'i slob ma
T02D1261:311b-32: gzhug pa'i cho gas bdag nyid dang por dkyil 'khor
T02D1261:311b-34: rigs kyi bdag pos dbang mtha' dag gi bar rdzogs par byas la /
T02D1261:311b-35: de nas 'di ltar las thams cad dang rjes su
T02D1261:311b-36: gnang ba thob nas dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug
T02D1261:311b-37: pa'i don du zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen
T02D1261:311b-38: po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin de kho na
T02D1261:311b-39: nyid kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu'i chos thams cad kyi
T02D1261:311b-40: bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi lus
T02D1261:311b-41: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang bden pa
T02D1261:311b-42: dang dran par bya ba'i phyir dga' bas tshigs su
T02D1261:311b-43: bcad pa 'di nyan du gzhug go //
T02D1261:311b-44: nam mkha'i las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D1261:312a-1: gter gyi mchog / sems dpa'i rdo rje chen po'i dngos //
T02D1261:312a-2: dpal ldan kye rdor sogs bdag sgrubs //
T02D1261:312a-3: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1261:312a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D1261:312a-5: don dam mi 'gyur bdag la sgrubs //
T02D1261:312a-6: skyon rnams kun dang bral ba ste //
T02D1261:312a-7: 'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags khyod //
T02D1261:312a-8: 'dod chags che la dgyes chen po //
T02D1261:312a-9: bcom ldan bdag la de nyid sgrubs //
T02D1261:312a-10: shin tu dag pa rnams kyi mchog / gdod ma nas grol de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1261:312a-11: kun du bzang po kun gyi mchog / byang chub sems dpa' bdag la sgrubs //
T02D1261:312a-12: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya ni //
T02D1261:312a-13: dngos grub rdo rje mthar thug pa //
T02D1261:312a-14: rdo rje snying po'i bdag por gyur //
T02D1261:312a-15: sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa'o //
T02D1261:312a-16: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02D1261:312a-17: sems can kun gyi yid nyid ni //
T02D1261:312a-18: 'dod mchog dam tshig rnams kyi mchog / bden pa gang gis ye shes te //
T02D1261:312a-19: shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1261:312a-20: bden pa de yis mgon po bdag / khyod kyis 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1261:312a-21: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1261:312a-22: dag cing dang la rnyog pa med //
T02D1261:312a-23: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1261:312a-24: rgyu dang las las mnyam par byung //
T02D1261:312a-25: de nyid las byas de bzhin nyid //
T02D1261:312a-27: gzugs brnyan gsal por dri med par //
T02D1261:312a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor nas byung ba'i slob dpon gyi
T02D1261:312a-29: zhabs gnyis la dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro bas phyag
T02D1261:312a-30: 'tshal la // drang bar bya ba'i phyir slob mas
T02D1261:312a-31: gsol ba gdab par bya ba ni 'di ltar gsol
T02D1261:312a-33: 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang //
T02D1261:312a-34: mgon pos bdag la stsal nas ni //
T02D1261:312a-35: dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang //
T02D1261:312a-36: slob dpon las kyang gsung du gsol //
T02D1261:312a-37: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rnams //
T02D1261:312a-38: sdom pa gsang ba rnams kyi mchog / sems can rnams kyi don gyi rgyus //
T02D1261:312a-39: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur //
T02D1261:312a-40: de nas 'di ltar gsol ba btab nas bla mas
T02D1261:312a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la gsol ba btab par
T02D1261:312a-42: bya ste / bdag che ge mo ming 'di zhes //
T02D1261:312b-0: byang chub sems @312b ni gzung ba la //
T02D1261:312b-1: dam tshig sdom par ldan par ni //
T02D1261:312b-4: de nas slob dpon gyis brjod par bya ste /
T02D1261:312b-5: gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa //
T02D1261:312b-6: gsang chen yongs su gzung ba yi //
T02D1261:312b-7: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02D1261:312b-8: 'chal zhes slob mas kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:312b-9: de nas slob dpon gyis lus la khrus dang dri
T02D1261:312b-10: zhim po dang me tog gi phreng ba dang gos
T02D1261:312b-11: dmar po cod pan dang bcas pa la gdong pa
T02D1261:312b-12: gos dmar pos bkab la yon phul te /
T02D1261:312b-14: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
T02D1261:312b-15: las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i bum pa'i chus gtor la /
T02D1261:312b-16: slob ma 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs la mig dang lus
T02D1261:312b-17: la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs par rnam par bsams
T02D1261:312b-18: nas / yol bas bcad pa byas nas dkyil 'khor
T02D1261:312b-19: du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir kye snying du sdug
T02D1261:312b-20: pa khyod su yin zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D1261:312b-21: des kyang skal bzang snying du sdug pa bdag go zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:312b-22: de nas bla mas kyang me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1261:312b-23: de yi ge h'u% gis shar sgor gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1261:312b-24: de nas 'di'i snying gar aom yo ga tsi tta
T02D1261:312b-25: autpa da ya mi zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnal
T02D1261:312b-27: aom su ra tes ma ya stvam ho siddhi badzra
T02D1261:312b-28: ya tha su kham zhes bya ba 'dis snying gar
T02D1261:312b-29: me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gzhag par bya'o
T02D1261:312b-30: // de nas 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1261:312b-31: cad kyi sa de ring khyod byin gyis brlab par
T02D1261:312b-32: // 'gyur ro // khyod kyis 'di de bzhin gshegs
T02D1261:312b-33: pa thams cad kyi mchog gi gsang chen gyi dkyil
T02D1261:312b-34: 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la brjod par mi
T02D1261:312b-35: // 'gyur ro // bya zhing / gzhan dad pa med pa rnams la brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D1261:312b-36: de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags sam /
T02D1261:312b-37: takka'i sngags kyis slob ma drangs la /
T02D1261:312b-38: aa kham b'i ra h'u% zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis
T02D1261:312b-39: yol ba'i nang du bcug la slob dpon dang dkyil
T02D1261:312b-40: 'khor la phyag byas nas slob mas 'di skad brjod
T02D1261:312b-41: par bya'o // aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1261:312b-42: kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi'o
T02D1261:313a-0: par bya'o // // aom slob dpon rnams kyi bsnyen bkur @313a * //
T02D1261:313a-1: gyi phyir bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02D1261:313a-2: aom sems can rnams kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi'o zhes bya bas so //
T02D1261:313a-3: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:313a-4: deng 'dir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1261:313a-5: rigs su zhugs kyis de bas na ngas kyang rdo
T02D1261:313a-6: rje ye shes bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1261:313a-7: ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1261:313a-8: kyi dngos grub kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan lta
T02D1261:313a-10: khyod kyis 'di ni dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i sngon du brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D1261:313a-11: des dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya bas so //
T02D1261:313a-12: de nas slob ma'i spyi bor rdo rje bkod la /
T02D1261:313a-13: 'di de rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02D1261:313a-14: gal te khyod kyis tshul 'di ni //
T02D1261:313a-15: 'ga' zhig drung du bzlas gyur na //
T02D1261:313a-16: mgo bo dag ni gshegs par byed //
T02D1261:313a-18: de nas snying gar rdo rje bkod la //
T02D1261:313a-19: aom rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang ni //
T02D1261:313a-20: de ring khyod kyi snying la gnas //
T02D1261:313a-21: gal te khyod ni smra byed na //
T02D1261:313a-23: zhes bya ba 'dis mnas bsgags la //
T02D1261:313a-24: bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i dri zhim po'i chus yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1261:313a-25: aom badzra ma ho da ka zhes bya ba 'dis lan bdun bzlas te /
T02D1261:313a-26: 'di de dmyal ba'i chu yin te //
T02D1261:313a-27: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1261:313a-28: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
T02D1261:313a-29: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig / ces brjod la blud par bya'o //
T02D1261:313a-30: de nas slob ma dam bcas pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:313a-31: deng nas bzung steng ni khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ste //
T02D1261:313a-32: gang nga yis brjod pa 'di dag khyod kyis bya zhing /
T02D1261:313a-33: nga la khyod kyis brnyas par yang mi bya'o //
T02D1261:313a-34: nyam nga ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas
T02D1261:313a-35: te dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bya
T02D1261:313a-36: bas so // de nas sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D1261:313a-37: shv'a dhi ti shth'a na ta ma badzra sv'a h'a
T02D1261:313a-38: bas so // / zhes brjod du bcug la de'i
T02D1261:313a-39: snying gar sa'i dkyil 'khor la% yig las skyes pa
T02D1261:313a-40: gru bzhi pa ser po zur bzhir rdo rje rtse
T02D1261:313a-41: gsum pa'i yi ge h'u% gis byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1261:313a-42: bas so // / bsgom par bya'o // mgrin par
T02D1261:313b-0: ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ba% yig las skyes pa @313b
T02D1261:313b-1: zlum po dkar ba bum pas mtshan pa /
T02D1261:313b-2: aa'i yi ges byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1261:313b-3: de nas spyi bor rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam yig las skyes pa gzhu'i rnam pa nag po //
T02D1261:313b-4: mtha' gnyis su dar dbyangs g-yo bas mtshan pa dbus su ha% gis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam zhing /
T02D1261:313b-5: rkang mthil gnyis su dzdza yig yang dag par 'bar ba bsam par bya'o //
T02D1261:313b-6: de nas de'i 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1261:313b-7: steng du ra% yig las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1261:313b-8: kha dog dmar po zur gsum pa bsgom par byas
T02D1261:313b-9: la des snang bar byas te /
T02D1261:313b-10: dril bu dkrol la a'a be sha ya stvam bha ya ra ra ra ra /
T02D1261:313b-11: tsa la ya tsa la ya /
T02D1261:313b-12: h'u% aa dzheem: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul la
T02D1261:313b-13: ji srid du babs kyi bar du dbab par bya'o
T02D1261:313b-14: // yang na slob ma'i rkang pa'i 'og tu rlung
T02D1261:313b-15: gi dkyil 'khor las sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs
T02D1261:313b-16: // pa bsgoms la / des de bskul bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1261:313b-17: de nas yang drag po'i gar dang bcas pas dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02D1261:313b-18: aom li le li le h'u% zhes bya ba'i sngags babs kyi bar du brjod la /
T02D1261:313b-19: de babs par rig nas kyang 'dod chags rdo rjer
T02D1261:313b-20: bsams la de'i lce la a'a: yig dmar po bsgoms
T02D1261:313b-21: la / rdo rje smros shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:313b-22: de nas de babs pa la brtan par bya ba'i phyir ti shtha badzra zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:313b-23: de ltar dris pa dang dge ba dang mi dge ba smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1261:313b-24: de nas aom ti shtha badzra sa ma ya pra
T02D1261:313b-25: ti sa li te h'u% h'u% ho ho sv'a h'a
T02D1261:313b-26: / zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis babs pa brtan par bya zhing /
T02D1261:313b-27: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bden pa'i byin rlabs bdar bar bya'o //
T02D1261:313b-29: bdag gis slob ma rab gzhug pas //
T02D1261:313b-30: lha rnams kyi ni rim pa ni //
T02D1261:313b-31: ji ltar bsod nams de ltar 'gyur //
T02D1261:313b-33: de yi rigs ni snod yin te //
T02D1261:313b-34: gang 'di'i bsod nams rjes mthun pa //
T02D1261:313b-37: de nas de'i mig gis ci mthong zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D1261:313b-38: des brjod pa'i dkar po dang /
T02D1261:314a-0: nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang bas zhi ba dang @314a * //
T02D1261:314a-1: rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi dngos grub
T02D1261:314a-2: tu 'os pa de la rim pas brjod par bya'o
T02D1261:314a-3: // de nas gzung ba'i me tog gi phreng ba yi ge h'u% gis 'phangs la /
T02D1261:314a-4: pra t'i tstsha ho zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:314a-5: de nas dngos grub dman pa dang mchog me tog lhung ba lhas mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1261:314a-6: lha rnams kyi ni khyad par las //
T02D1261:314a-7: de bzhin gnas la gus pa yi //
T02D1261:314a-8: sangs rgyas la lhung me tog de //
T02D1261:314a-9: dbu snyan gtsug tor dbu skra na //
T02D1261:314a-10: dngos grub phyag rgya cher gsungs te //
T02D1261:314a-11: sngags la mngon par sbyar nas 'gyur //
T02D1261:314a-12: spyan dang zhal gyi phyogs cha na//
T02D1261:314a-13: sngags kyi dngos grub dag tu gsungs //
T02D1261:314a-14: sku yi stod du dngos grub mchog / sku smad na ni 'bring du bshad //
T02D1261:314a-15: 'og char dngos grub tha ma ste //
T02D1261:314a-16: mchog ni byang chub ces su bshad //
T02D1261:314a-17: 'bring gis dbang phyug dngos grub ste //
T02D1261:314a-18: tha ma yis ni nor rnams grub //
T02D1261:314a-19: 'di yis rim pa thams cad ni //
T02D1261:314a-20: bdag med ma rnams la yang nges //
T02D1261:314a-21: gzhan du lha rnams gdan la ni //
T02D1261:314a-22: dngos gru gsum gyi rnam par ston //
T02D1261:314a-23: ji ltar bor ba'i me tog de //
T02D1261:314a-24: gzugs brnyan las ni ring lhung na //
T02D1261:314a-25: de yi dngos grub ring bar 'gyur //
T02D1261:314a-27: sngags pa rnams la phan pa'am //
T02D1261:314a-29: de yi spyod yul lhung gyur na //
T02D1261:314a-30: de ni de yi rigs su shes //
T02D1261:314a-31: 'phangs pa'i me tog phreng ba de //
T02D1261:314a-32: gal te bar du lhung gyur na //
T02D1261:314a-33: gang la nye gyur phreng ba de //
T02D1261:314a-34: de ni de yi rigs su ston //
T02D1261:314a-36: gal te de ni ltung gyur na //
T02D1261:314a-37: de yi dngos grub gzhan 'gyur te //
T02D1261:314a-39: gal te rgya la phreng ba de //
T02D1261:314a-40: phreng ba re kh'ar lhung gyur na //
T02D1261:314a-41: zhi byas slar yang phreng ba ni //
T02D1261:314a-42: de ni nan tan gyis gtor bya //
T02D1261:314a-43: slar yang de la nye gyur na //
T02D1261:314a-44: blo ldan gyis ni slar mi dor //
T02D1261:314a-45: de la dngos grub thob pa min //
T02D1261:314a-46: gar yang nges med blo ldan kye //
T02D1261:314a-47: gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang //
T02D1261:314a-48: phyir lhung ba la 'bras bu med //
T02D1261:314a-49: zhi byas slar yang blo ldan gyis //
T02D1261:314a-50: phreng ba de ni dor bar bya //
T02D1261:314a-51: thig gi rnam par shes pa nyid //
T02D1261:314a-52: gzhan med rtag par snying po lhung //
T02D1261:314a-53: de yi spyod yul de shes nyid //
T02D1261:314b-0: @314b phred ba ru ni rab tu grags //
T02D1261:314b-1: de la sogs pa rnam pa yis //
T02D1261:314b-2: gal te yang dag ldang ma yin //
T02D1261:314b-3: slar yang phreng ba 'phang bar bya //
T02D1261:314b-4: de ltar gsum yin spang bar bya //
T02D1261:314b-6: de nas me tog lhung ba las lha shes par bya ste /
T02D1261:314b-7: slar yang 'phangs pa'i me tog blangs te blangs nas kyang //
T02D1261:314b-8: 'di ni mnyes shing stobs po che //
T02D1261:314b-9: zhes brjod la slob ma'i spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1261:314b-11: de nas slob ma'i mig dag la yi ge aom 'bar ba dang ldan par bsgoms la /
T02D1261:314b-12: aom de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02D1261:314b-13: mig rnams 'byed pa rnams kyi mchog /
T02D1261:314b-14: rdo rje'i mig ni bla med par //
T02D1261:314b-15: mig rnams thams cad dbye bar bya //
T02D1261:314b-16: zhes brjod la gdong bcings pa bkrol la //
T02D1261:314b-17: kye rdo rje'i mthong ba brjod par bya ba ni so so'i lha rnams kyi ming dang /
T02D1261:314b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i ming sngon du 'gro ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1261:314b-20: de nas bla ma dgyes nas slob ma la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:314b-21: deng nas dad pa bskyed byos la //
T02D1261:314b-23: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02D1261:314b-24: rig pa'i sngags ni byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1261:314b-25: grub pa'i rnal 'byor de dag dang //
T02D1261:314b-26: 'byor pa thams cad mngon du gyur //
T02D1261:314b-27: dngos grub rgyus ni dam tshig skyongs //
T02D1261:314b-28: sngags kyi dngos la 'bad ldan gyis //
T02D1261:314b-29: de nas slob mas kyang bla ma'i zhabs ngag la btung de 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:314b-30: aom badzra mandala ma h'a mandala pra ti ho& ham //
T02D1261:314b-31: aom yo ga mandala ma h'a mandalam //
T02D1261:314b-33: aom gu hya mandala ma h'a mandala da kshi ho& ham /
T02D1261:314b-35: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1261:314b-36: de nas bla ma dang slob ma'i dge ba spel
T02D1261:314b-37: bar bya ba'i phyir bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad
T02D1261:314b-39: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig sems can ma lus phan zhing mos pa yis //
T02D1261:314b-40: dpal ldan khrag 'thung skyon rnams mang po rnam par sel mdzad pa //
T02D1261:314b-41: rig pa'i yan lag chags pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid legs nyams pa'i //
T02D1261:314b-42: dbang rnams mchog la yang ni des ni bkra shis
T02D1261:314b-43: gyur par shog / bkra shis gang zhig lha dang
T02D1261:315a-2: ltag na med pa'i chos rnams dag ni de yis gsungs pa dang //
T02D1261:315a-3: 'jig rten gsum po rnams su bdag med par ni rnam bshad pa //
T02D1261:315a-4: dbang rnams mchog la yang ni des ni bkra shis
T02D1261:315a-5: gyur par shog / bkra shis gang zhig mchog gi
T02D1261:315a-6: chos rnams rtag par 'dzin mdzad pa'i //
T02D1261:315a-7: lha yi tshogs ni rgyal ba'i sras po'i tshogs kyi
T02D1261:315a-8: bdag / bkra shis bzang po sems can phan 'dogs
T02D1261:315a-10: dbang rnams mchog la yang ni des ni bkra shis gyur par shog / de nas /
T02D1261:315a-11: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1261:315a-12: ji ltar che ba'i chen po gsal //
T02D1261:315a-13: bdag la drang ba'i don du ni //
T02D1261:315a-14: nam mkha' rdo rje la sogs stsol //
T02D1261:315a-15: zhes bya ba 'dis gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1261:315a-16: slob ma padma la sogs pa'i gdan la 'dug cing /
T02D1261:315a-17: mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su bsams la //
T02D1261:315a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dpal kye rdo rje'i
T02D1261:315a-19: gzugs dang ldan pas ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i
T02D1261:315a-20: rin po che'i bum pa bsnams nas dbang bskur bar
T02D1261:315a-22: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur ni /
T02D1261:315a-23: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1261:315a-24: gsang ba gsum las mnyam byung ba //
T02D1261:315a-25: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la stsol //
T02D1261:315a-27: khu tshur gyi chu dang bcas pa'i rdo rje blangs la /
T02D1261:315a-28: aom badzra aa bhi shi nytsa /
T02D1261:315a-29: zhes brjod la 'khor los sgyur ba ltar dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1261:315a-30: de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i rim pa ste /
T02D1261:315a-31: dang po rnam rgyal bum pa'i chus //
T02D1261:315a-32: de'i 'og goo r'i sogs bum chus //
T02D1261:315a-33: de 'og sbos mo sogs bum chus //
T02D1261:315a-34: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo chu'i dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D1261:315a-35: de nas slob ma rin chen rgyal po'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02D1261:315a-36: rang gi lha dang ldan pa'i gser la sogs pa
T02D1261:315a-37: las byas pa'i cod pan sngar brjod pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1261:315a-38: spyi bor bzhag la phyogs bcu na de bzhin gshegs
T02D1261:315a-39: pa'i rigs kyi bdag po'i gzugs kyi cod pan la
T02D1261:315a-40: zhugs par bsgoms la sngar bzhin du dbang bskur bar
T02D1261:315a-41: bsgom mo // mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi cod pan gyi dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D1261:315b-0: de nas 'od @315b dpag med kyi gzugs su de bsgoms la rdo rje'i rtse mo nas blangs te /
T02D1261:315b-1: sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni //
T02D1261:315b-2: de ring khyod la dbang bskur gyis //
T02D1261:315b-3: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1261:315b-4: dngos grub phyir ni rdo rje long //
T02D1261:315b-5: zhes brjod la rdo rjes snying ga dang spyi gtsug dang mgrin pa rnams su reg par bya ste /
T02D1261:315b-6: lag pa rnams su byin la sngar bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1261:315b-7: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D1261:315b-8: de nas don yod grub pa'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1261:315b-9: dril bu lag pa g-yon par byin la rdo rje
T02D1261:315b-10: dang dril bur ldan pa'i lag pa gnyis 'khyud pa'i
T02D1261:315b-11: tshul dbyer med pa'i rnam pa la aom badzra aa
T02D1261:315b-12: dhi ba dhi stv'am aa bhi shi nytsa mi /
T02D1261:315b-13: ti shtha badzra sa ma ya stam zhes brjod la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1261:315b-14: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid dril bu'i dbang zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1261:315b-15: de nas de rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su
T02D1261:315b-16: bsams la rdo rje dang dril bu spyi bor bzhag
T02D1261:315b-17: ste / aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shi nytsa mi /
T02D1261:315b-18: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta zhes brjod la /
T02D1261:315b-19: kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
T02D1261:315b-20: rnam grangs 'dis rigs dang rjes su mthun pa nyid
T02D1261:315b-21: kyi tshul gyis 'khor los sgyur pa'i ming gi dbang
T02D1261:315b-22: bskur bar bya'o // 'di ni me long lta bu'i
T02D1261:315b-23: ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ming gi dbang zhes
T02D1261:315b-24: bskur bar bya'o // bya'o // dbang 'di rnams kyis
T02D1261:315b-25: ni sngags kyi rgyud nyan pa dang bshad pa dang
T02D1261:315b-26: sgrub pa la dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1261:315b-27: de nyid kho na rig pa'i dbang gi ye shes
T02D1261:315b-28: rigs rnam pa lnga po de'i phyir dbang lnga zhes
T02D1261:315b-29: bya'o // gang gang snang ba de de rnams //
T02D1261:315b-30: de ni he ru ka dngos nyid //
T02D1261:315b-31: phal pa gang ni dag pa'i chos //
T02D1261:315b-32: sangs rgyas ye shes kyang de yin //
T02D1261:315b-33: rig pa'i dbang spyis byang chub nges par thob pa yin gyis /
T02D1261:315b-34: khyad par gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa ma yin no //
T02D1261:315b-35: de bas nan tan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1261:315b-36: byang chub nges par thob par bya ba'i phyir slob
T02D1261:315b-37: dpon gyi dbang gi don du gnyer ba spyi'i sdom
T02D1261:315b-38: pa bzung zhing slob dpon gyi sdom pa bzung ba
T02D1261:315b-39: la brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'i gzhan du na lhung
T02D1261:316a-2: de gnyis kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir te /
T02D1261:316a-4: bdag ni dbugs 'byin pa thob po zhes mos pa'i
T02D1261:316a-5: stobs kyis 'bad pa med pa'i nges pa thob pa'o
T02D1261:316a-6: // snod kyi bye brag mthong nas brtul zhugs ster ba ltar lung bstan pa dang /
T02D1261:316a-7: dbugs dbyung ba yang de kho na rig pas mi sbyin no //
T02D1261:316a-9: brgya la de bzhin du rjes su gnang ba yang
T02D1261:316a-10: byin nas sems can thams cad ces bya ba'i tshigs
T02D1261:316a-11: su bcad pa lnga po 'dis zhes ni gzhan dag
T02D1261:316a-12: na re'o // de nas gzhan yang rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bslabs la /
T02D1261:316a-13: rtsa ba'i sngags sam snying po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la slob ma de la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1261:316a-14: nga yis khyod la bcom ldan sbyin //
T02D1261:316a-15: 'dir ni nye bar gyur pa yin //
T02D1261:316a-17: nga yis khyod ni bcom ldan gzung //
T02D1261:316a-18: bdag la nye ba ru ni gyur //
T02D1261:316a-19: zhes slob mas kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:316a-20: de nas bla mas khyod kyis sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D1261:316a-21: 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba 'ga' zhig gi drung
T02D1261:316a-23: gleng gzhi des khyod dmyal bar gyur ta re zhes slob ma la brjod par bya'o //
T02D1261:316a-24: rig pa'i dbang gi tsho ga'o //
T02D1261:316a-25: de nas rig pa'i dbang dang slob dpon gyi sdom pa 'dzin pas phyag 'tshal te yon phul la /
T02D1261:316a-26: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1261:316a-27: ji ltar che ba'i chen po gsal //
T02D1261:316a-28: bdag la'ang drang ba'i don du ni //
T02D1261:316a-29: nam mkha' rdo rje la sogs stsol //
T02D1261:316a-30: zhes bya ba'i gsol ba 'di dang ldan pas sgo
T02D1261:316a-31: na gnas pa gzhug par bya zhing padma 'dab ma
T02D1261:316a-32: brgyad pa bris la de'i steng du bzhag ste /
T02D1261:316a-33: rang 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor gyis slob ma nam mkha' la gzhag la /
T02D1261:316a-34: rang gi snying ga'i 'od zer las kha nas bton
T02D1261:316a-35: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dpal he ru
T02D1261:316a-36: ka'i gzugs dang ldan pas mchod pa rnam pa lnga
T02D1261:316a-37: dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rol
T02D1261:316a-38: mo dang bkra shis kyi glu dang ldan pas phyag
T02D1261:316a-39: na rin po che'i bum pa nas ye shes kyi
T02D1261:316a-40: chu gnas pas dbang bskur bar rnam par bsgom par
T02D1261:316a-41: bya ste / rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ni //
T02D1261:316b-0: khams @316b gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
T02D1261:316b-1: gsang ba gsum las mnyam byung ba //
T02D1261:316b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsal gyur to //
T02D1261:316b-3: zhes brjod la padma'i snod la gnas pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1261:316b-4: de nas 'di la dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid dang lha'i de nyid dang /
T02D1261:316b-5: slob dpon gyis yongs su spyad pa yang brjod par bya ste /
T02D1261:316b-6: de la shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ting nge
T02D1261:316b-7: 'dzin gyi snying po sdud pa'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1261:316b-9: sems yang dag par bslang ba rnam par dag pas ni khang bu brtsegs pa'o //
T02D1261:316b-10: tshad las mnyam par bgrod pa nyid kyi phyir gru bzhi'o //
T02D1261:316b-11: byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang dga' ba dang /
T02D1261:316b-12: btang snyoms rnam par dag pas ni thig bzhi'o //
T02D1261:316b-13: chos rjes su dran pa'i sbyor bas ni thig skud do //
T02D1261:316b-15: mthar 'dzin par lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1261:316b-16: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta
T02D1261:316b-17: ba las grol zhing ye shes rnam par dag pas
T02D1261:316b-20: sems can gyi don byed pa dang /
T02D1261:316b-21: dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang /
T02D1261:316b-22: sdom pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pas ni rgyan du mas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1261:316b-24: dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1261:316b-25: shes rab kyi dbang pos ni sems kyi rnam grangs rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1261:316b-26: sdig pa mi dge ba skyes pa rnams 'joms par brtson pa ni shar gyi rta babs so //
T02D1261:316b-27: ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir so sor rtog pa ni nub kyi rta babs so //
T02D1261:316b-28: skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir rab tu brtson pa ni byang gi rta babs so //
T02D1261:316b-29: yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rta babs bzhi'o //
T02D1261:316b-30: lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang /
T02D1261:316b-31: chos zhes bya ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pas ni stegs bu bzhi'o //
T02D1261:316b-34: gzungs rnam par dag pas ni bi dhi ka la
T02D1261:316b-35: rnam par gnas pa'i glu dang gar la sogs pa'i
T02D1261:316b-36: mchod pas sbrel pa'i lha mo'i tshogs so //
T02D1261:316b-37: stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni shar gyi sgo'o //
T02D1261:316b-38: mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni lho'i sgo'o //
T02D1261:317a-0: smon pa med pa rnam par thar @317a * //
T02D1261:317a-1: pa'i sgo ni nub kyi sgo'o //
T02D1261:317a-2: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni byang gi sgo'o //
T02D1261:317a-3: 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni shar gyi ya phubs so //
T02D1261:317a-4: brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni lho'i sgo'o //
T02D1261:317a-5: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni nub kyi sgo'o //
T02D1261:317a-6: dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni byang gi sgo'o //
T02D1261:317a-7: thugs rjes brlan cing bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T02D1261:317a-8: tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa ni bum pa gang ba'o
T02D1261:317a-9: // dran pa dang chos rnam par 'byed pa dang dga' ba dang /
T02D1261:317a-10: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang brtson 'grus dang /
T02D1261:317a-11: btang snyoms dang zhes bya ba byang chub kyi yan
T02D1261:317a-12: lag bdun rnam par dag pas ni me tog gi
T02D1261:317a-13: phreng ba'o // sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol
T02D1261:317a-14: zhing ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab yang dag par
T02D1261:317a-15: 'dus pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam gyi ye shes
T02D1261:317a-17: nyon mongs pa'i sa bon la bton nas nyon mongs pa rnam par 'joms pa ni do shal lo //
T02D1261:317a-18: nyon mongs pa'i sa bon nye bar bcom nas nyon
T02D1261:317a-19: mongs pa rnams phyed pa ni do shal phyed pa'o
T02D1261:317a-20: // me long la sogs pa'i ye shes kyis ni me long ngo //
T02D1261:317a-21: 'gro ba thams cad dbyer med par brjod pas der
T02D1261:317a-22: gnas pa'i nyon mongs pas rjes su ma gos pa'i
T02D1261:317a-23: phyir padma'o // sems can rnams mnyam par 'byung ba'i
T02D1261:317a-24: phyir byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
T02D1261:317a-25: ba'i rnam par dag pas ni zla ba'o //
T02D1261:317a-26: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i
T02D1261:317a-27: shes rab ye shes ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro
T02D1261:317a-28: // gzugs la sogs pa las phyin ci ma log
T02D1261:317a-29: pa'i phyir gong na med cing mtha' las 'das pa'i
T02D1261:317a-30: // yon tan no // chos kyi dbyings shin tu
T02D1261:317a-31: rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i phyir mchod pa
T02D1261:317a-32: // yon tan no // rnam pa lnga'o // ngo
T02D1261:317a-33: tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas ni na bza'o
T02D1261:317a-34: // yon tan no // rnam pa lnga'o // //
T02D1261:317a-35: gdul bya la bskyod pa'i dam pa'i chos mdo'i sde
T02D1261:317a-36: // yon tan no // rnam pa lnga'o // //
T02D1261:317a-37: dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang lung du
T02D1261:317a-38: bstan pa'i sde dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang
T02D1261:317a-39: ched du brjod pa'i sde dang de lta bu byung
T02D1261:317a-40: // yon tan no // rnam pa lnga'o // //
T02D1261:317a-41: dang / ba'i sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i
T02D1261:317a-42: sde dang rmad du byung ba'i sde ste /
T02D1261:317a-43: lta ba'i yan lag dgu'i tshig thams cad na gnas pa'i phyir /
T02D1261:317b-0: ba dan @317b sna tshogs pa'i rtse mo na dril bu la rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra'o //
T02D1261:317b-1: sha dang lha dang shes rab dang chos dang /
T02D1261:317b-2: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi lta ba rnam par dag pas ni tshon sna lnga'o //
T02D1261:317b-3: bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor la yang de bzhin te /
T02D1261:317b-4: 'on kyang khyad par ni 'di yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
T02D1261:317b-5: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
T02D1261:317b-6: ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang /
T02D1261:317b-8: dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang 'du shes pa ste /
T02D1261:317b-9: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par dag pas ni ka ba brgyad do //
T02D1261:317b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis thams cad du thogs pa
T02D1261:317b-11: med par rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D1261:317b-12: bskor ba ka ba brgyad kyi steng rdo rje phreng
T02D1261:317b-13: bas sbrel pa'o // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D1261:317b-14: bdag med par bsdus pas ni dur khrod brgyad do
T02D1261:317b-15: bas sbrel pa'o // // dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1261:317b-16: gzugs kyi skye mched kyi lus su gyur pa la so sor rtog pa ni dkar mo'o //
T02D1261:317b-17: sgra'i skye mched kyi sems su gyur pa la so sor rtog pa'i ngo bo ni chom rkun ma'o //
T02D1261:317b-18: dri'i skye mched dag tu gyur pa la so sor rtog pa'i ngo bo ni ro langs ma'o //
T02D1261:317b-19: ro'i skye mched ye shes su gyur pa la so sor rtog pa'i ngo bo ni gha sma r'i'o //
T02D1261:317b-20: sa'i khams lus kyi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo ni pukka s'i'o //
T02D1261:317b-21: chu'i khams sems kyi de kho na nyid ye shes kyi ngo bo ni ri khrod ma'o //
T02D1261:317b-22: me'i khams ngag gi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo ni tsanda l'i'o //
T02D1261:317b-23: rlung gi khams ye shes kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ni dombi n'i'o //
T02D1261:317b-24: ji ltar brjod pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1261:317b-25: 'bras bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang
T02D1261:317b-26: gong na med pa'i byang chub dpal kye rdo rje'o
T02D1261:317b-27: // bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor la ni reg pa'i
T02D1261:317b-28: skye mched dang shes rab kyi dbang po'i ngo bo
T02D1261:317b-30: chos kyi skye mched dang dad pa dang //
T02D1261:317b-32: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang stobs kyi ngo bo ni mkha' spyod ma'o //
T02D1261:317b-33: dad pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo ni sa 'og gnas ma'o //
T02D1261:317b-34: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'i ngo bo ni chom rkun ma'o //
T02D1261:317b-35: dran pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo ni ro langs ma'o //
T02D1261:317b-36: ting nge 'dzin gyi dpong po'i ngo bo ni gha sma r'i'o /
T02D1261:318a-1: tu dga' ba dang dri ma med pa dang /
T02D1261:318a-2: 'od byed pa'i sa'i ngo bo ni pukka s'i'o //
